desc: Community based art supply and hip hop shop. Gallery viewings and community events. Basketball court.

layout.text: AppleJuiceBreak by L e f t S i d e Gallery

Brothers D and Wade, 94/97, shared a dream of opening a graffiti supply and design shop. Ten years later the dream has resurfaced. AppleJuiceBreak opens its doors to the first brick and mortar location in Denver, Colorado. Through partnering with Montana Colors S. L., And Style File magazine, A.P.J.B. brings the world-wide take over to you. All things hip-hop, for graffiti writers, by graffiti writers.
